reviews.review: Awesome to see so many characters in one movie
Very amazing movie. It very was intense almost everyone (including me) had the water works by the end.
The best film I have ever seen. It is action from start to finish and keeps you guessing throughout

Wow ... excluding dark knight trilogy best super-hero movie so far I've seen - and I've been watching since spiderman and ironman, well done - favorite thing was how the directors vision and feel for seperate movie franchises truly did feel like one big universe while preserving there own styles, very good movie - worth the money!
There were so many things it could have done better.

I could not have possibly asked for a better conclusion to the beloved marvel cinematic universe. This movie had so many heartfelt, genuine moments, but was also full of fantastic humour, drama, and interaction. The twists are incredible, I never could have expected Black Panther and Spider-Man to die, of all characters. Some might say this makes the film too dark, although, many complaints with the marvel universe have always been about lack of consequences and strong villains. While Hela, Loki, Vulture, Ego, Killmonger, and Ronan were all great villains, but Josh Brolinâ€™s Performance as Thanos was damn near perfect, almost painting him as the protagonist. My only complaint with the movie was with the fast pacing, but I would expect this, with so much to jam into one movie. Overall a complete cinematic masterpiece. Hats off to you, Russo Brothers!!!

ARE YOU KIDDING ME, this sucked. About 5 mins of the the Hulk and it was hoping all over the place. The ending is horrible and I no there is a Part 2 but I will never watch this again not even on DVD. The only good thing was the new costumes.
My favorite Avengers movie by far! How did critics give the Last Jedi a better score?

Blew me completely away! 
Went to see it on midnight screening Wednesday and was wide awake for the whole thing. 
Amazingly done, all characters were woven in perfectly and there was a good balance between one liners and serious scenes. 
The ending is baffling. 
I'm a big fan of the MCU and it helps to have seen all the connecting movies for maximum emotional impact. Cant wait until Captain Marvel and Antman&the Wasp. 
Feel emotionally wrecked by Disney! Good job! 
If you are planning on going and haven't seen any of the movies that lead up to it, please do yourself a favor and see at least the main Avengers movies ( Assemble and Ultron) and Captain America Civil war. 
So far everyone I know loves this movie, even my hairdresser who had only seen Guardians and Dr Strange. 
Must see movie of the decade.
